name: Novell-Sentinel-Log-Manager
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: Novell Sentinel Log Manager - log management solution

matches.regexp:
(?-mix:

Novell Identity Audit<\/span><\/h1>\s+

Novell<\/p>\s+

Version ([^>]+)<\/p>)

matches.text: Novell Sentinel Log Manager supports Firefox 3 (works best on 3.6) and Internet Explorer 8 (works best on 8.0)
